death.attack.dungeonsdelight.ancient_egg: %1$s had their body overtaken by sculk
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.bloody_mary: %2$s watched %1$s have their body monsterize before them...
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.cleaver: %1$s was sliced and diced into a delight
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.cleaver.pla: %2$s sliced and diced %1$s into a delight
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.dungeon_sto: %1$s was thrown on the grill by The Monstrous Chef %2$s
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.serrated: %1$s was left to bleed out their wounds
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.serrated.pl: %2$s left %1$s to bleed out their wounds
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.skull_heart: %1$s was melted by a monstrous blast
%1$s was melted by the monstrous blast of %2$s
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_biteable: Biteable foods will allow you to eat from it multiple times and refill it with specific items
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_bloody_m: Consume the disgusting concoction known as a bloody mary
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_ghastly_: Consume a bottle of Ghastly Spirits, a drink that can help you quickly escape your enemies!
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_horse.de: Consume an entire horse alive using the voracity effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_monster_: Combine monsters and ingredients together to create your first monster food
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_sculk_fo: Sculk foods grant a varying amount of experience based on the amount of sculk ingredients
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_sniffer_: Consume a Sniffer food... you monster
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_candied_: Use an amethyst rock candy to imprison a Vex or Silverfish
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_netherit: Upgrade your cleaver using netherite and prepare to slice and dice like a master chef
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_sculk_po: Cut a chunk of sculk into a sculk polyp
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_slime_no: Cut a slab of slime into gooey noodles
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_stained_: Destroy a spawner to obtain a stained scrap, a piece of metal with lively capabilities
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_all_m: Obtain all monster effects at the same time, who's the real monster now?
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_burro: Silverfish foods will allow you to consume blocks by destroying them but only can eat monster foods, transforms the Haste effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_decis: Stick held monster foods have a chance to land 1.75x critical hits, transforms the Strength effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_exuda: Rot foods will make your absorption hearts take additional damage but explode on entities that hit you, transforms the Absorption effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_perce: Glowing foods allow the user to see other entities through walls
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_pounc: Spider foods will allow you to climb and slide down blocks, transforms the Leaping effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_tenac: Bowled monster foods naturally heal based on how hungry you are, transforms the Comfort effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_vorac: Plated monster foods will allow you to eat monsters alive but only can eat monster foods, transforms the Nourishment effect
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_dungeo: Place down a dungeon stove which it's flame can heat a monster pot
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_embedd: Combine eggs into a pile of sculk and let it fester
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_monste: Put down a Monster Pot and start preparing monstrous meals!
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_rotbul: Plant a rotbulbling and prepare for a monstrous harvest
dungeonsdelight.advancement.root.desc: A world of monsters await you!
Throw a Cleaver to pierce and scavenge extra goods from foes
dungeonsdelight.advancement.use_rancid_r: Use Rancid Reduction to rot a crop
dungeonsdelight.ancient_egg: %1$s had their body overtaken by sculk
dungeonsdelight.cleaver: %1$s was sliced and diced into a delight
dungeonsdelight.jei.sculking.accelerator: Sped up by adjacent activators (see below)
dungeonsdelight.jei.sculking.night: Sped up and can only sculk by moonlight
dungeonsdelight.jei.sculking.spawner: Sped up by adjacent spawner heat conductors (see below)
dungeonsdelight.serrated: %1$s was left to bleed out their wounds
dungeonsdelight.skull_heart_blast: %1$s was melted by a monstrous blast
effect.dungeonsdelight.burrow_gut.descri: Consumes haste, the user can only eat monster foods but has a chance to eat blocks they break (chance based on block hardness).
effect.dungeonsdelight.decisive.descript: Consumes strength, the user has a chance to deal a critical strike hit that inflicts 1.5x extra damage of the original attack.
effect.dungeonsdelight.exudation.descrip: Consumes absorption, all absorption hearts become Exudation hearts and take 1.25x extra damage but unleash a deadly explosion upon getting damaged.
effect.dungeonsdelight.feral_bite.descri: The user of this effect can inflict serrated on attacked targets.
effect.dungeonsdelight.pouncing.descript: Consumes jump boost, allows the user to climb up blocks when sneaking and grants +5% increased movement speed per level.
effect.dungeonsdelight.ravenous_rush.des: Increases the movement speed and attack speed of the user, granted upon consuming a mob fully with Voracity.
effect.dungeonsdelight.serrated.descript: The user of this effect will very slowly take damage, the damage bypasses most forms of protection.
effect.dungeonsdelight.tenacity.descript: Consumes comfort, the user heals faster based on how close they are to starving (slower when fuller).
effect.dungeonsdelight.voracity.descript: Consumes nourishment, the user can only eat monster foods but attacking mobs causes the user to consume them. Upon consuming a mob fully, the user will receive Ravenous Rush for a short time.
enchantment.dungeonsdelight.ricochet.des: Thrown cleavers now bounce and don't have a cooldown upon missing an entity, each bounce increases the damage by 1.1x.
enchantment.dungeonsdelight.serrated_str: Cleavers deal less damage but inflict serrated onto struck entities causing protection bypassing damage.
farmersdelight.jei.info.candied_silverfi: Obtained by attacking a Silverfish with rock candy.
farmersdelight.jei.info.candied_vex: Obtained by attacking a Vex with rock candy.
farmersdelight.jei.info.cleaver: Cleavers are lightweight ranged and melee weapons. They can harvest Straw from grasses, and guarantee secondary drops from entities.
farmersdelight.jei.info.rock_candy: Rock candy can be used to capture mobs inside of them by attacking them.
farmersdelight.tooltip.average_xp: Grants a sizeable amount of experience
farmersdelight.tooltip.average_xp_poison: Grants a sizeable amount of experience and cures poison
farmersdelight.tooltip.bloody_mary: Monsterizes one status effect... at a cost
farmersdelight.tooltip.bubblegunk: Can be chewed multiple times, makes the player hungry
farmersdelight.tooltip.chance_to_not_con: Chance to not consume when eaten
farmersdelight.tooltip.large_xp: Grants a large amount of experience
farmersdelight.tooltip.large_xp_poison_p: Grants a large amount of experience and cures poison
farmersdelight.tooltip.monster_burger: Every sin, disease, and unhealthy treat, merged together between two slices of bread...
farmersdelight.tooltip.small_xp: Grants a small amount of experience
farmersdelight.tooltip.small_xp_poison_p: Grants a small amount of experience and cures poison
farmersdelight.tooltip.undead: Monsterizes one status effect if no monster effects are active
farmersdelight.tooltip.wip: Warning! This item is currently unfinished and is subject to change...
